trans-unit.source: Defines a contract that components can use to access a delegate across application domain and process boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 定义一个协定，组件可使用该协定跨应用程序域和进程边界访问委托。

trans-unit.source: To invoke a delegate, use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract.InvokeDelegate%2A> method.

To add a delegate to an event or remove a delegate from an event, call the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A> method of the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract> that is returned by <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetAddMethod%2A> or <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetRemoveMethod%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加到事件的委托或移除事件委托，调用<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>方法<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract>返回<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetAddMethod%2A>或<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetRemoveMethod%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Pass an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract> that represents the delegate to the `parameters` parameter of <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>.
An <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayContract" /> that specifies the delegate parameters.
Invokes the delegate that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract" /> identifies.
trans-unit.target: 调用此 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract" /> 标识的委托。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> that specifies the return value of the invoked delegate.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" />，指定已调用委托的返回值。
